descriptionHtml:
[img] http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t630/sikozuShanu/SecretSolaceHeader_zpsd2333ef6.jpg [/img]

[font=\"Arial\"] 

[color=#00FFFF] [b]* VERSION 1.0 AND LATER ARE CLEANED WITH TESVEDIT. *[/b] [/color]


[img] http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t630/sikozuShanu/SecretSolaceDescription_zps3d8e1d60.jpg [/img]


[color=#00FFFF] * This is my first mod.  Ever.  Of any kind.  Please be gentle. * [/color] 

[color=#7DEABE] This is a house mod complete with master bedroom and bath, companion rooms, a housecarl room, a room specifically for Serana, kitchen, dining, garden and more.  As a girl and an artist, I might have gotten a little carried away with some of the lighting and effects.  Apologies.  Also, it much larger than I intended; when I began I didn\'t have a real sense of scale.  Although, it does make a nice place to herd all of your companions. [/color]

[color=#7DEABE]It is located in a mountain near Riften and the rear of the building faces an underground lake.  (Yep, I totally made that up just because I like water.  And things that live in water.)  So the back of the building is lined with aquarium walls.  (It took me quite a while to figure that out.) [/color]

[color=#7DEABE]Secret Solace is chock-full of custom storage, shrines, stones and decorative lighting.  (This took me forever and a day to create, partly because I spent massive amounts of time on lighting only to discover later that I needed to delete half of it if I wanted anyone to be able to run it.)  I\'ve uploaded quite a few images to give you a better idea of what this mod has to offer. [/color]

[color=#7DEABE]I did everything I could to make sure that it is clean and that all of the storage is safe (I triple-checked them) and I am using it myself.  HOWEVER... I am completely new to this and that being the case, I would be surprised if I didn\'t mess something up.  So please make a nice clean save to go back to, just in case. [/color]

[color=#7DEABE]Also, I have a powerful machine.  I can run this mod without any difficulty.  I do have some concerns that people with limited systems might experience some trouble.  If this is the case, please let me know and I will try to pare it down some more. [/color]  

[color=#7DEABE]I recommend the excellent [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13268/?] W.A.T.E.R.[/url] mod to make the most of the aquarium walls. [/color] 


[img] http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t630/sikozuShanu/SecretSolaceChangeLog_zpsf2f8ebe4.jpg [/img]


[color=#7DEABE]v. 1.1	- Cleaned .esp using TESVEdit [/color]
	[color=#7DEABE] - Added dragon claw storage [/color]
	[color=#7DEABE] - Added thieves guild special item storage [/color]
	[color=#7DEABE] - Finally fixed the front door (interior and exterior) so that you don\'t see rock/black void [/color]
	[color=#7DEABE] - Continued the navmesh underwater so that followers can swim in the pond [/color]
	


[color=#7DEABE]v. 1.0	- Cleaned .esp using TESVEdit [/color]
	[color=#7DEABE] - Adjusted interior front door to open same direction as exterior door [/color]
	[color=#7DEABE] - Removed large obstruction from the master bedroom that I somehow managed to miss [/color]
	[color=#7DEABE] - Fixed the key storage container [/color]



[img] http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t630/sikozuShanu/SecretSolaceRequirements_zpscc95f71d.jpg [/img]



[color=#7DEABE] Skyrim [/color]
[color=#7DEABE] Dawnguard [/color]
[color=#7DEABE] Hearthfire [/color]


[img] http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t630/sikozuShanu/SecretSolaceInstallation_zps4389abdc.jpg [/img]


[color=#7DEABE] Place the SecretSolace.bsa and SecretSolace.esp files in your Skyrim Data folder.  Check the .esp file before starting the game.  I love the Nexus Mod Manager.  It makes my mod addiction less painful. *If updating, remove all player items from the home and create a new save before loading the new .esp and .bsa.* [/color]


[img] http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t630/sikozuShanu/SecretSolaceUninstallation_zps859683b0.jpg [/img]


[color=#7DEABE] Delete both files. [/color]


[img] http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t630/sikozuShanu/SecretSolaceConflicts_zps2ea4705f.jpg [/img]


[color=#7DEABE] Apparently there is an issue with Sharpshooter\'s ENB that causes a severe lighting issue in the kitchen.  Looking into it. [/color]


[img] http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t630/sikozuShanu/SecretSolaceCredits_zps67e3ec74.jpg [/img]


[color=#7DEABE] Thanks to these fantastic modders for their resources, without which this mod would be lackluster indeed. [/color]

[color=#FBB917] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2235573/?tb=mods&pUp=1] Oaristys [/url]        [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16525/?] Modders Resource Pack [/url] [/color]		
[color=#FBB917] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2250922/?tb=mods&pUp=1] Blary [/url]           [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14134/? ] OpenBooks Resource [/url] [/color]
[color=#FBB917] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2250922/?tb=mods&pUp=1] Blary [/url]           [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30602/? ] Ingredients Wall Art Resource [/url] [/color]
[color=#FBB917] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2250922/?tb=mods&pUp=1] Blary [/url]           [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30599/? ] Alchemy Clutter Resource [/url] [/color]
[color=#FBB917] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2250922/?tb=mods&pUp=1] Blary [/url]           [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30605/? ] Ingredients in a Jar Resource [/url] [/color]
[color=#FBB917] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2250922/?tb=mods&pUp=1] Blary [/url]           [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30603/? ] Moth in a Cage Resource [/url] [/color]
[color=#FBB917] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1308288/?tb=mods&pUp=1] Runspect [/url]        [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26132/? ] Resources for Modders [/url] [/color]
[color=#FBB917] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/867382/?tb=about&pUp=1] DarkRider [/url]       [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12394/? ] Celtic Decor for Skyrim I [/url] [/color]
[color=#FBB917] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3324489/?tb=mods&pUp=1] Deadly Serious [/url]  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4092/? ] Deadly Serious Tutorial - Nifskope and Texture Transparency [/url] [/color]
[color=#7DEABE] (If it weren\'t for this tutorial, this mod would have never been completed.  Doomfunk helped me realize my aquarium dreams.) [/color] [/font]
author: sikozuShanu
